messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, I'm Mei Patel. I just made an order with my new user ID mei_patel_7272, but I have two problems. I think the 1000-piece jigsaw I bought will be too hard for my kid, so I'd like to swap it for the easiest one with the fewest pieces. Also, I think I typed my address wrong, so I need to check and fix it for my order and my account.
